subject: Update SonarCloud validation in typescript template
description:
**Type:** Task

## Description
Apply the same SonarCloud validation fix to the TypeScript template at `typescript/copy-overwrite/.github/workflows/quality.yml`. This ensures the fix propagates to all Lisa-managed TypeScript projects.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Template file matches project file changes
- [ ] Same validation logic as main workflow file

## Relevant Research
The template file is identical to the project file and needs the same fix.
This file is used by Lisa to apply workflow configuration to TypeScript projects.

## Skills to Invoke
- `/coding-philosophy` - Always required

## Implementation Details
Files to modify:
- `typescript/copy-overwrite/.github/workflows/quality.yml` (same location as project file)

Copy the exact same changes from the project workflow file.

## Testing Requirements
### Unit Tests
- N/A - workflow file changes

### Integration Tests
- N/A - workflow file changes

### E2E Tests
- N/A - workflow file changes

## Verification
**Type:** `manual-check`

**Proof Command:**
```bash
diff .github/workflows/quality.yml typescript/copy-overwrite/.github/workflows/quality.yml | head -20
```

**Expected Output:**
No differences (empty output or minimal expected differences)

## Learnings
During implementation, collect any discoveries valuable for future developers.

verification.expected: No differences or minimal expected differences
